plot: City of Dreams is an original comedic musical web series that chronicles the trials and tribulations of three down on their luck musical theatre actors.
plot_en: City of Dreams is an original comedic musical web series that chronicles the trials and tribulations of three down on their luck musical theatre actors.
plot_es: City of Dreams is an original comedic musical web series that chronicles the trials and tribulations of three down on their luck musical theatre actors.
title: City of Dreams
